title: Flight Simulator 2020 - Addon spotlight - C-17 Globemaster - version 0.8
description:
A new beta version of the C-17 globemaster has been released today. The team of developers working on the aircraft have done a lot of work again. Besides the compatibility for Sim Update 6 the cockpit shell, HUD model, glare shield and seats are completely updated. In addition to this the engines of the aircraft have been revamped. As last big update the team added some new autopilot functionalities to the aircraft.

0:00 intro video
0:10 review liveries
03:36 start of the internal and external review
08:30 start the engines
20:04 take off and start of our flight review

If you want to try the aircraft yourself please download it from the site below:
https://flightsim.to/file/12408/msfs-native-c-17-globemaster
